title: Thai chicken curry with pineapple
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon Thai curry paste', '1 (400g) can coconut milk', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon dark brown sugar', '250ml chicken stock', '4 chicken thighs, cut into bite size pieces', '75g frozen peas', '75g chopped green pepper', '60g chopped carrot', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '2 tablespoons chicken stock', '125g chopped fresh pineapple']
